QuestData.Title: Running Late
QuestData.Description:
I beg your pardon, but I am a little concerned at Lord Waycrest's tardiness.
I'd hate to be a bother, but would you mind checking on him? The ceremony awaits his presence.
You can find him in the bride's room, at the top of the tower.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Lord Arthur Waycrest in Whitegrove Chapel.
QuestData.CompletionText: It must be around here somewhere...
QuestData.RewardText:
Splendid! I'll just need to take a few moments to go over this and I'll be right down.
Please let Lucy and Alexander know I will be ready shortly.
